org.drip.product.creator

Class IRSBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.product.creator.IRSBuilder

  • public class IRSBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the suite of helper functions for creating the Interest Rate Swap Product from different kinds of inputs.

        Creates an IRS product from effective/maturity dates, coupon, and IR curve name/rate index
        Parameters:
        dtEffective - JulianDate effective
        dtMaturity - JulianDate maturity
        dblCoupon - Double coupon
        strIR - IR curve name
        strFloatingRateIndex - Floater Index
        strCalendar - Optional Holiday Calendar for coupon accrual
        Returns:
        IRS product
